//sensor stanby	
0x3000	01h
0x3001	01h
0x3002	01h
//setting	
0x3005	00h
0x3007	00h
0x3009	12h
0x300A	3Ch
0x300B	00h
0x3011	0Ah
0x3012	64h
0x3014	00h
0x3018	65h
0x3019	04h
0x301A	00h
0x301C	30h
0x301D	11h
0x3022	00h
0x3046	00h
0x3048	00h
0x3049	08h
0x304B	0Ah
0x305C	18h
0x305D	03h
0x305E	20h
0x305F	01h
0x309E	4Ah
0x309F	4Ah
0x30D2	19h
0x30D7	03h
	
0x3129	1Dh
0x313B	61h
0x315E	1Ah
0x3164	1Ah
0x317C	12h
0x31EC	37h
	
These registers are set in CSI-2 interface only.	
0x3405	20h
0x3407	03h
0x3414	0Ah
0x3418	49h
0x3419	04h
0x3441	0Ah
0x3442	0Ah
0x3443	03h
0x3444	20h
0x3445	25h
0x3446	47h
0x3447	00h
0x3448	1Fh
0x3449	00h
0x344A	17h
0x344B	00h
0x344C	0Fh
0x344D	00h
0x344E	17h
0x344F	00h
0x3450	47h
0x3451	00h
0x3452	0Fh
0x3453	00h
0x3454	0Fh
0x3455	00h
0x3472	9Ch
0x3473	07h
0x3480	49h
//stanby cancel	
0x3000	00h
0x3001	00h
0x3002	00h
